content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
This structure generates electricity using steam power. It currently lacks fuel for the boiler and the steam engine is not connected to the boiler output or the power network.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (positions include x=-8.5,y=-0.5 to x=-4.5,y=0.5) (Status: FULL_OUTPUT)
*   Boiler at Position(x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Status: NO_FUEL)
*   PipeGroup intended for steam output (positions include x=-6.5,y=2.5 to x=-2.5,y=6.5) (Status: EMPTY)
*   Steam Engine at Position(x=0.5, y=6.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED, NO_INPUT_LIQUID)
*   Small Electric Pole at Position(x=0.5, y=4.5) (Part of a larger disconnected pole group)
